Title: S5 Ep. 200 Maryann Kilgallon
Description:
Do you have children or aging parents that you want to protect? Maryann Kilgallon, a #Latina #entrepreneur and founder of POMM, is on a mission to protect children and aging parents through the use of the IoT wearable device. Want to learn more about POMM and Maryann? Tune in to hear how this amazing woman wants to reduce anxiety and protect vulnerable individuals. 

The Intern Whisperer is brought to you by Employers 4 Change - Improving #Skills based diversity #recruitment and #management for #interns and #employees alike.
